tests.name: csrf0
tests.setup: sudo -H pip3 install selenium; sudo -H pip3 install pyvirtualdisplay; chmod +x test/chromedriver

tests.name: csrf1
tests.setup: sudo -H pip3 install selenium; sudo -H pip3 install pyvirtualdisplay; chmod +x test/chromedriver

tests.name: xss0
tests.setup: sudo -H pip3 install selenium; sudo -H pip3 install pyvirtualdisplay; chmod +x test/chromedriver

tests.name: xss1
tests.setup: sudo -H pip3 install selenium; sudo -H pip3 install pyvirtualdisplay; chmod +x test/chromedriver

tests.name: xss2
tests.setup: sudo -H pip3 install selenium; sudo -H pip3 install pyvirtualdisplay; chmod +x test/chromedriver

tests.name: xss3
tests.setup: sudo -H pip3 install selenium; sudo -H pip3 install pyvirtualdisplay; chmod +x test/chromedriver

tests.name: No Repeated XSS Attacks
tests.run: cmp --silent xss_0.txt xss_1.txt; echo $?; cmp --silent xss_0.txt xss_2.txt; echo $?; cmp --silent xss_0.txt xss_3.txt; echo $?; cmp --silent xss_1.txt xss_2.txt; echo $?; cmp --silent xss_1.txt xss_3.txt; echo $?; cmp --silent xss_2.txt xss_3.txt; echo $?
